metadata.synopsis: The players have started the final encounter against the Netherbrain. The Crown of Karsus is within sight.This is played on the first party member to act in the Netherbrain fight.The party may not have a mindflayer yet, in which case the person saying this AD needs to draw attention to the fact that the group should make use of the supreme tadpole in order to be able to dominate the brain.

0.speaker: Orpheus
0.text: Remember, only an illithid can dominate the brain. Use the parasite - do it now!
0.context: NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it

1.speaker: The Emperor
1.text: Remember - only an illithid can dominate it. Use the parasite I gave you.
1.context: NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it

2.speaker: The Emperor
2.text: We need to reach the core of its will. Get as close as you can to the Crown, and cast the spell to compel it to submit.
2.context: NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it

3.speaker: Player
3.text: The Crown, up ahead - time to cast the spell again, and break its will.
3.context: NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it

4.speaker: Orpheus
4.text: We need to reach the core of its will. Get as close as you can to the Crown, and cast the spell to compel it to submit!
4.context: NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Only an illithid can dominate the brain. It's time to use the parasite the Emperor gave us!
5.context: NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it

6.speaker: The Emperor
6.text: I must reach the core of its will. Help me get close to the Crown so I can cast the spell to compel it to submit.
6.context: NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it
